description:
This is a great trail to get to near Kearney Lake.  There might be a lot of people on the trail at first near Kearney Lake but as you venture out more, you will have the place to yourself.  Any signage is good to look at as you need to get to the Fox Lake look-off (N44° 41' 04.8" W63° 42' 16.9").  At the look-off is all kinds of bouldering opportunities especially if you are looking towards the lake, it will be to your left.

After the look-off the official trail continues another 200m or so and then the trail becomes the EVIL BIRCH!   Nice section of mountain biking to be had here with lots of boulders to jump, constructed ramps in a few spot, one of which is a drop of at least 7ft!  If you continue all the way on this trail, you eventually cross a small brook draining Quarry Lake towards Washmill Lake.  The Bad Luck falls (N44° 40' 29.2" W63° 41' 01.9") occur right here downstream of the bridge.  It's more of a cascade type of falls and the name I took from some maps!
directions: A few ways to get into this trail system.  I took the entrance locate at the end of Colins Rd.
title: Evil Birch -Bad Luck Fall
